languages.text: "Отправил{mf|ся|ась} на абордаж "Бессердечного" в составе отряда С. Антара. Ликвидировал{mf||а} объект "Саргона". Захваченное судно переведено в разряд эскортных". Слово "эскортных" обведено жирной линией чернил.

traits.locale_text: "Отправил{mf|ся|ась} на абордаж "Бессердечного" в составе отряда проктора Антара. Ликвидировал{mf||а} объект "Саргона". Захваченное судно переведено в разряд эскортных". Слово "эскортных" обведено жирной линией чернил.

"Отправил{mf|ся|ась} на абордаж "Бессердечного" в составе отряда проктора Антара. Ликвидировал{mf||а} объект "Саргона". Захваченное судно переведено в разряд эскортных". Слово "эскортных" обведено жирной линией чернил.

languages.text: "Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled several times in ink.
languages.original_text: "Отправил{mf|ся|ась} на абордаж "Бессердечного" в составе отряда С. Антара. Ликвидировал{mf||а} объект "Саргона". Захваченное судно переведено в разряд эскортных". Слово "эскортных" обведено жирной линией чернил.

traits.locale_text: "Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled in ink several times.

"Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled in ink several times.

"Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled several times in ink.

languages.text: "Als Teil der Einheit unter dem Kommando von S. Anthar an Bord der Heartless gegangen. Ziel 'Sargona' neutralisiert. Das erbeutete Schiff wurde zu einem Geleitschiff umgebaut." Das Wort 'Geleitschiff' wurde mehrmals mit Tinte eingekreist.
languages.original_text: "Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled several times in ink.

traits.locale_text: "Als Teil der Einheit unter dem Kommando von S. Anthar an Bord der Heartless gegangen. Ziel 'Sargona' neutralisiert. Das erbeutete Schiff wurde zu einem Geleitschiff umgebaut." Das Wort 'Geleitschiff' wurde mehrmals mit Tinte eingekreist.

languages.text: « A abordé le Sans-Cœur avec l'unité menée par S. Anthar et neutralisé la cible "Sargona". Le vaisseau capturé a été reconverti en vaisseau d'escorte. » Le mot « escorte » est entouré plusieurs fois.
languages.original_text: "Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled several times in ink.

traits.locale_text: « A abordé le Sans-Cœur avec l'unité menée par S. Anthar et neutralisé la cible "Sargona". Le vaisseau capturé a été reconverti en vaisseau d'escorte. » Le mot « escorte » est entouré plusieurs fois.

languages.text: “作为索罗蒙·安萨麾下小队的一员登上了无心号，消灭了目标‘萨戈纳’。无心号虚空舰已夺回，已改造为护卫舰。”其中，“护卫”这个词被划了好几圈。
languages.original_text: "Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled several times in ink.

traits.locale_text: “作为索罗蒙·安萨麾下小队的一员登上了无心号，消灭了目标‘萨戈纳’。无心号虚空舰已夺回，已改造为护卫舰。”其中，“护卫”这个词被划了好几圈。

languages.text: «Con la unidad liderada por S. Anthar, abordamos la Desalmada y neutralizamos al objetivo "Sargona". La nave capturada fue convertida en nave de escolta». Alguien ha rodeado la palabra «escolta» repetidamente.
languages.original_text: "Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled several times in ink.

traits.locale_text: «Con la unidad liderada por S. Anthar, abordamos la Desalmada y neutralizamos al objetivo "Sargona". La nave capturada fue convertida en nave de escolta». Alguien ha rodeado la palabra «escolta» repetidamente.

languages.text: 「S・アンサール率いる部隊の一員としてハートレスに乗艦。ターゲット『サルゴナ』を無力化。拿捕された船は護衛艦に転用された」「護衛」という語がインクで何度も丸で囲まれている。
languages.original_text: "Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled several times in ink.

traits.locale_text: 「S・アンサール率いる部隊の一員としてハートレスに乗艦。ターゲット『サルゴナ』を無力化。拿捕された船は護衛艦に転用された」「護衛」という語がインクで何度も丸で囲まれている。

languages.text: "S. Anthar önderliğindeki birimin parçası olarak Taşkalp'e binildi. 'Sargona' hedefi etkisiz hâle getirildi. Ele geçirilen gemi, refakatçi gemi yapıldı. "Refakatçi" sözcüğü, kalemle daire içine alınmış.
languages.original_text: "Boarded the Heartless as part of the unit led by S. Anthar. Neutralised the target 'Sargona.' The captured vessel was turned into an escort ship." The word "escort" has been circled several times in ink.

traits.locale_text: "S. Anthar önderliğindeki birimin parçası olarak Taşkalp'e binildi. 'Sargona' hedefi etkisiz hâle getirildi. Ele geçirilen gemi, refakatçi gemi yapıldı. "Refakatçi" sözcüğü, kalemle daire içine alınmış.
